remarks: A cyclically shifted word is a function from a half-open range of integers of the same length as the word as domain to the set of symbols for the word.  (Contributed by AV, 12-Nov-2018.)
statement: cshwf $p |- ( ( W e. Word A /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( W cyclShift N ) : ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) --> A ) $.
